body: I play Minecraft on 1.8, do you recommend I have Java 64 bit and 32 bit? Can you give me a link as where to find the right one? :)
body_tagged: I play Minecraft on 1.8, do you recommend I have Java 64 bit and 32 bit? Can you give me a link as where to find the right one? :)
title: Which Java? 3;

replies.body:
If you play 1.8, I suggest Java 1.8. But if you play 1.7 then use Java 1.7

And don't forget this rule: If you want to play with Minecraft Forge, ALWAYS use Java 1.7 or it won't load your FML.
replies.body_tagged:
If you play 1.8, I suggest Java 1.8. But if you play 1.7 then use Java 1.7

And don't forget this rule: If you want to play with Minecraft Forge, ALWAYS use Java 1.7 or it won't load your FML.

replies.body: Use the launcher that doesn't need java.
replies.body_tagged: Use the launcher that doesn't need java.

replies.body: That just downgrades the performance of the game i.e. FPS, Other Settings
replies.body_tagged: That just downgrades the performance of the game i.e. FPS, Other Settings

reply_to.body: Use the launcher that doesn't need java.
reply_to.body_tagged: Use the launcher that doesn't need java.

replies.body: Well it doesn't for me, I get more fps with the non-java version. I believe there was a forum post about this before, too.

replies.body: I had the discussion with someone else, and are you talking about 1.5 ► New Formatted Launcher? If not then I was talking about something else.

replies.body:
Well when I said "we" I meant the community on another forum post. I guess it's the new launcher. What were you talking about?

Anyway this article describes how to download the Java free version:
http://www.howtogeek.com/210907/minecraft-doesnt-need-java-installed-anymore-its-time-to-remove-it/

replies.body:
It always hurts me if I see people around telling shit to other. Java is needed to play Minecraft. If you install it, or if it is being installed automatically by the launcher.

I think Mojang/Microsoft changed this because 7 years old kids don't get how they can install Java by theirself... I guess they think it is a virus lol

reply_to.body: Use the launcher that doesn't need java.
reply_to.body_tagged: Use the launcher that doesn't need java.

replies.body: I know it is needed but without having it system-wide, just on minecraft, it reduces the security threats system-wide java faces.
